about_the_game:
Embark on a brutal journey of survival in a perpetual winter, try to find out what happened to the world as we know it and meet other survivors along the way.



Play the prelude to the events taking place in PERMAFROST. Learn how to endure in this icy expanse, scavenge for resources, hunt rare animals, and craft essential tools for survival amidst the unforgiving elements.

In this demo, you will experience all core gameplay elements of PERMAFROST, including survival, hunting, crafting, building and exploration. Survive as a lone wolf or team up with a group of friends in 4 player co-op multiplayer. How long will you be able to withstand the cold?



* Some content in this demo may vary from the final game.
* It is not possible to carry over progress from this demo to the full game.
* Demo offers English, German and Polish language. Full game will be localized into several other languages.
* No dog companions were harmed in the making of this demo.

What’s coming in the full game?


In the full game, Permafrost lets you explore a frozen apocalypse, navigate vast urban environments, and face or join factions in a delicate fight for survival using diverse resources, weapons, and equipment—all within an exciting, immersive narrative

Let us know what you think! Your feedback is essential as we continue to enhance the player experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Killing animals (both to defend and hunt) and occasionally people. Consuming tabaco, coffee and non-descript medicine to survive in the cold.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400 or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3070 Ti 8GB or AMD Radeon RX 6750 XT 12GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Survive a harsh, eternal winter in Permafrost. Hunt, craft, build, and explore solo or with up to 4 friends in co-op. Gather resources, construct shelters, craft your equipment, and navigate tense relationships with other factions while battling the elements to stay alive.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Polish
*languages with full audio support
